title: Backup still buggy, after Google released a fix. Backup Now button greyed out, waiting to backup
content:
The only known fix is to do an ADB backup using an USB cable. I can't connect the pixels USB cable to my older laptop. But why make it so complicated in the first place, Google? It's a know bug now for a while, still hasent been fixed. This user has the same problem:

https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/1520722?hl=en
